response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This price reflects my commitment to making such high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return on investment for us. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1250000}
